title: JPMorgan Reclaims US Investment-Grade Credit Sales Crown in 2025
description: JPMorgan Chase & Co. reclaimed the top spot on the US investment-grade corporate bond league table this year, after being edged out by Bank of America in 2024.
content: JPMorgan Chase & Co. reclaimed the top spot on the US investment-grade corporate bond league table this year, after being edged out by Bank of America in 2024.
